meanings.sent1: The loud music was displeasing to the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The food had a displeasing taste.
meanings.sent3: The cat's displeasing meows made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The storm's displeasing howls filled the night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's displeasing scowl silenced the class.
meanings.sent6: Her displeasing behavior upset her friends.
meanings.sent7: The movie's displeasing ending left the audience disappointed.
meanings.sent8: The cold, displeasing wind made the walk unbearable.
meanings.sent9: The old, displeasing smell lingered in the room.
meanings.sent10: The rough, displeasing texture of the fabric irritated her skin.

meanings.sent1: The weather took a displeasing turn.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with displeasing odors.
meanings.sent3: The displeasing color of the walls clashed with the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The displeasing news dampened their spirits.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was displeasing to the child.
meanings.sent6: His displeasing attitude made it hard to work with him.
meanings.sent7: The displeasing sound of the alarm clock woke her up.
meanings.sent8: The displeasing sight of the littered park saddened the visitors.
meanings.sent9: The displeasing texture of the food made her lose her appetite.
meanings.sent10: The displeasing behavior of the guests ruined the party.
